game_description: aNUma is a group-based virtual reality journey that you experience with an expert guide. A combination of minimal, yet beautiful graphics and a stunning score make for a transformative environment to journey through with friends, coworkers, or people you've just met. Join by invitation at your appointed session time for an unforgettable journey.
review_1: Ripple by anuma is head and shoulders above any meditation experience I have had in VR.
